job.title: Lead Software Engineer - Data Platform (US REMOTE)
job.description: we are a series d company thats on a mission to make hospitals more efficient with data science and machine learning health systems and hospitals across states rely on our awardwinning products to increase patient access decrease wait times and reduce healthcare delivery costs we have raised more than million from toptier investors such as insight partners and goldman sachs we have been named among the top ai companies in the worldltbrgtour data platform ingests data at scale from electronic health record systems at s of hospitals nationwide using healthcare data exchange protocols such as hl and ehr it is written in python uses apache airflow for workflow scheduling and runs on aws as a senior software engineer on the data platform you will play a pivotal role in shaping the data platform and taking it to the next levelltbrgtltstronggtltemgtthis position can be performed remotely from anywhere in the us regardless of any location that might be
